name: nontemporal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal relating to spiritual matters rather than practical ones: The guru confined himself to nontemporal considerations. She was fascinated by the notion of a nontemporal God who had created a temporal world.
language
  formal or specialized not relating to time: This adverb can have both a temporal and nontemporal meaning. The ephemeral nature of knowledge gives it a nontemporal quality.
More examplesFewer examplesThese tales feature an enormous number of characters, especially non-temporal ones.We use both temporal and nontemporal information to interpret the event.
